views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13

A colorfully random way to customize the look and feel of your device, and add extra functionality. Color pickers for dock, open and closed folders plus many more new features. Tweak has over 40 buttons, sliders and colorpickers each for different options.

Compatible all devices on iOS 11.0-13.x

Configure options from Settings.

Now compatible with iOS 11-13.3 Bug fixes for all iOS versions Improvements to label hiding (now instant and universally applied) Fixed ‚Äúskip screenshot preview‚Äù not working on iOS 12. All options now working on iOS 11-12.1.2


Changed all settings to user defaults, added arc for automated memory counting (retain/release etc). Less resprings, more instant changes....

Added some support for coloring FloatyDock tweak, and devices that natively use them. Added color pickers for Dock, Folder icons, Open Folder color, Icon text, Icon text highlights, Lockscreen date/time, picking a color for Spotlight, Control center, Passcode entry, timers, alerts, and all over parts of SB.

Over 40+ options now. Folder coloring supports themes with and without masks. Random text and highlight options are still there but improved by being able to combine with a single color and opacity level.

Works on all devices from iOS 11.0-11.4b
Fixed small appearance bug with CC options on iOS versions above 11.2, also changed ‚ÄúSquare CC‚Äù and ‚ÄúRounded / Circular CC‚Äù to ‚ÄúRound UI‚Äù and ‚ÄúSquare UI‚Äù including notifications, today view/ widgets, as well as Control Center.

Fixed typo in settings and one in share text as well. üòé
